```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

# Low SEP

```{r}
m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1 <- bam(stillbirth ~ s(GA_weeks) + s(mat_age) + s(birth_Y_M_num) + s(month, bs="cc") + s(mean_Alt_mean2)+  sex + Urban3 + Language + mother_nationality_cat2  + civil_status3 + HW + GR + COVID_first_wave + COVID_second_wave, family="binomial", data=bevn_eco_in6_L_SSEP1)  
summary(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1)

  plot(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1, trans = plogis, select=1, shift = coef(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1)[1], shade = TRUE, shade.col = "lightblue") #GA
  plot(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1, trans = plogis, select=2, ylim=c(0, 0.003), shift = coef(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1)[1], shade = TRUE, shade.col = "lightblue") #mat age
    plot(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1, trans = plogis, select=3, ylim=c(0.001, 0.001), shift = coef(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1)[1], shade = TRUE, shade.col = "lightblue") # time
  plot(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1, trans = plogis, select=4, ylim=c(0.0008, 0.0013), shift = coef(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1)[1], shade = TRUE, shade.col = "lightblue") #month
  plot(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1, trans = plogis, select=5, ylim=c(0.0004, 0.002), shift = coef(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1)[1], shade = TRUE, shade.col = "lightblue") #altitude
  
  k.check(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1) 
  concurvity(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1)
```

```{r}
#table to show OR, confidence interval and Cohen's d
  OR <- exp(coef(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1))
  beta <- coef(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1)
  Vb <- vcov(m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1, unconditional = TRUE)
  se <- sqrt(diag(Vb))
  lci <- exp(beta-1.96*se)
  uci <- exp(beta+1.96*se)
  d <- abs(beta)/1.81
  my.ci_m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1 <- data.frame(cbind(OR, lci, uci, d))
  round(head(my.ci_m_SB_bam_L_SSEP1, 15), 2)
```

# Middle SEP

```{r}

  plot(m_SB_bam_M_SSEP1, trans = plogis, select=4, ylim=c(0.0009, 0.0010), shift = coef(m_SB_bam_M_SSEP1)[1], shade = TRUE, shade.col = "lightblue") #month
```
